sources.title: Holland & Knight Serves as Regulatory Counsel to Frontdoor in $585 ...
sources.snippet: NEW YORK (December 20, 2024) - Holland & Knight acted as insurance regulatory counsel to Frontdoor Inc. (NASDAQ: FTDR) in its acquisition of 2-10 Home Buyers Warranty (2-10 HBW) in an all-cash transaction valued at $585 million. The transaction closed on December 19, 2024. Headquartered in Memphis, Tennessee, Frontdoor is the nation's leading provider of home warranties.
